content: downloads include a marked chart and written pattern for my overlay mosiac designs so you can create unique makes of your own blankets scarves hats handbags and more…there are so many options these designs are best suited for those who have some experience incorporating designs into their own creations so either some mosaic crochet experience or an intermediate crocheter but i don t want to deter anyone from trying go for it you are certain to fail if you fail to even try i promise it s not as hard as it looks and there are many folks happy to help you see the info below on where to find me and others willing to lend a virtual hand there are several design versions in this grand illusion collection 14 to be exact and they come in a wide range of sizes as well the size and number of repeats you choose will affect the look and size of your item so keep that in mind when choosing i m sure you ll find something that meets your need for whatever project you have in mind and check out my other designs as well…there really is something for everyone…i hope so anyway though these have been tested i m new to providing the written pattern portion so if you spot any errors or have any kindly given constructive feedback on any part of these or any of my designs i would really love to hear from you hate the ends of overlay read this>> if you love overlay mosaic but hate the ends as much as i do check out my method of overlay mosaic crochet with no ends to cut so no weaving at every row no carrying any yarn -so no waste or extra bulk and it s also very easy to incorporate the reversible method right as you go see youtube for the reversible method options here s my short under 15 minutes video tutorial for this method i have named endless overlay https //m youtube com/watch v=6sizmhaxbyi i also enjoy doing custom work or customization of my own designs so don t hesitate to ask if you can t find exactly what you need you can find me on my brand spankin new facebook page & group called y knot crochet please join me there https //www facebook com/groups/335723762013706/ ref=share i m often looking for testers and will post there so if that s something your are interested in shoot me a message from my page or just keep an eye out for announcements i have several more designs in a variety of stages lots of irons in the fire they are my own tooo many wip so little time so i would love to add to my tester team i do also help administer the mosaic crochet mals cals & more group on facebook so if you already have enough individual designer groups on your plate and you re not already a member come join
